subject_labels: Preserve all existing functionality while reducing template size by at least 40%
Convert all hardcoded values to parameters with proper validation rules
Implement proper resource dependencies using DependsOn only where necessary
Replace all Fn::Join constructs with Fn::Sub for improved readability
Consolidate duplicate security group rules using reusable mappings
Fix circular dependency between RDS instance and its parameter group
Implement condition-based resource creation for dev/staging/prod environments
Use CloudFormation pseudo parameters instead of hardcoded region/account values
Ensure all resources have DeletionPolicy and UpdateReplacePolicy attributes
Add proper metadata sections for CloudFormation Designer compatibility
author: iamarpit-turing
